details.description: Interface Account is exported but has no JSDoc documentation
details.fix_explanation: Added JSDoc with interface description and property documentation for 'id' and 'balance' fields. Documentation explains the purpose of each property.

details.description: Exported function calculateInterest lacks any documentation. Parameters, return type, and usage are undocumented.
details.fix_explanation: Added comprehensive JSDoc including function description, parameter documentation (@param), return value documentation (@returns), and a practical usage example.

details.description: Exported class AccountService lacks documentation. Class purpose and internal state are undocumented.
details.fix_explanation: Added JSDoc describing the class purpose, its responsibility in managing accounts, and the nature of public methods available.

details.description: Public method getAccount is undocumented. Parameter semantics, return behavior for missing accounts, and usage patterns are unclear.
details.fix_explanation: Added JSDoc documenting the parameter (id), return type (Account | null), behavior on missing account, and a practical usage example showing null-safety check.

details.description: Public method saveAccount lacks documentation. Parameter requirements and behavior regarding duplicate ids are undocumented.
details.fix_explanation: Added JSDoc documenting the account parameter, void return type, and clarifying that calling saveAccount with an existing id will overwrite the previous account. Included usage example.
